!4 Setting up unique fields
To set up one or more fields to be ''unique'' there are a few steps to take. If you want to configure multiple uniques or unique with combines the steps are repeated for each field you want to configure. 
There is however a small difference in the last step if you wish to set up a combine, but it is covered below in its own example.

The first thing you want to do is to create collectStorageTerm for the field you want to be unique.
!style_code(!style_pass[POST] /record/collectTerm)
!***> create a collectStorageTerm
{{{
{
    "name": "collectStorageTerm",
    "children": [
        {
            "name": "recordInfo",
            "children": [
                {
                    "name": "id",
                    "value": "exampleTextVarStorageTerm"
                },
                {
                    "name": "validationType",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "name": "linkedRecordType",
                            "value": "validationType"
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "linkedRecordId",
                            "value": "collectStorageTerm"
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "name": "dataDivider",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "name": "linkedRecordType",
                            "value": "system"
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "linkedRecordId",
                            "value": "cora"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "extraData",
            "children": [
                {
                    "name": "storageKey",
                    "value": "exampleTextVar"
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "attributes": {
        "type": "storage"
    }
}
}}}
*!
The storageTerm then needs to be added to a field you wish to be set up as unique by adding it to the correct child reference.
!style_code(!style_pass[POST] /record/metadata/{exampleGroup}) 
!***> storageTerm added to a child reference
{{{
{
    "name": "metadata",
    "children": [
        {
            "name": "recordInfo",
            "children": [
                {
                    "name": "id",
                    "value": "exampleGroup"
                }
                ...
            ]
        },
        ...
        {
            "name": "childReferences",
            "children": [
                ...
                {
                    "name": "childReference",
                    "repeatId": "1",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "name": "repeatMin",
                            "value": "0"
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "repeatMax",
                            "value": "20"
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "ref",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "name": "linkedRecordType",
                                    "value": "metadata"
                                },
                                {
                                    "name": "linkedRecordId",
                                    "value": "exampleMetadataTextVar"
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "childRefCollectTerm",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "name": "linkedRecordType",
                                    "value": "collectTerm"
                                },
                                {
                                    "name": "linkedRecordId",
                                    "value": "exampleTextVarStorageTerm"
                                }
                            ],
                            "attributes": {
                                "type": "storage"
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
                ...
            ]
        }
    ],
    "attributes": {
        "type": "group"
    }
}
}}}
*!
Finally the storageTerm needs to be added to the postType it's intended to be used on.
!style_code(!style_pass[POST] /record/recordType/{exampleRecordType})
!***> storageTerm added as a unique
{{{
{
    "name": "recordType",
    "children": [
        {
            "name": "recordInfo",
            "children": [
                {
                    "name": "id",
                    "value": "exampleRecordType"
                }
                ...
            ]
        },
        ...
        {
            "name": "unique",
            "repeatId": "1",
            "children": [
                {
                    "name": "uniqueTerm",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "name": "linkedRecordType",
                            "value": "collectTerm"
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "linkedRecordId",
                            "value": "exampleTextVarStorageTerm"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
}}}
*!
!style_fit_label(!style_green[Note for combine:]) This last step is slightly different if you want to add this as a combine for a unique. You need to add it as a combineTerm to a field where you already added a uniqueTerm.
!style_code(!style_pass[POST] /record/recordType/{exampleRecordType})
!***> adding a combineTerm to the field where you have added a uniqueTerm
{{{
{
    "name": "recordType",
    "children": [
        {
            "name": "recordInfo",
            "children": [
                {
                    "name": "id",
                    "value": "exampleRecordType"
                }
                ...
            ]
        },
        ...
        {
            "name": "unique",
            "repeatId": "1",
            "children": [
                {
                    "name": "uniqueTerm",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "name": "linkedRecordType",
                            "value": "collectTerm"
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "linkedRecordId",
                            "value": "exampleTextVarStorageTerm"
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "name": "combineTerm",
                    "repeatId": "0",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "name": "linkedRecordType",
                            "value": "collectTerm"
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "linkedRecordId",
                            "value": "exampleNumberVarStorageTerm"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
}}}
*!
